channel.title: CVE Feed for Thales CPL -- all

item.title: CVE-2021-42138|2024-08-04T03:30:37.956Z -- thales%20cpl -- safenet%20authentication%20service
item.description: A user of a machine protected by SafeNet Agent for Windows Logon may leverage weak entropy to access the encrypted credentials of any or all the users on that machine.
